sqlUnit.name: select_study_school_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id, t.name, t.address, t.create_time from tg_study_school t order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: select_study_teacher_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id, t.name, t.phone, t.level, t.create_time from tg_study_teacher t order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: select_study_classroom_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id, t.study_school_name, t.name, t.description, t.create_time from tg_study_classroom t order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: select_study_class_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id, t.name, t.teacher_name, t.level, t.description, t.create_time from tg_study_class t order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: select_study_student_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id, t.name, t.sex, t.birthday, t.school_name, t.parent_name, t.parent_phone, t.level, t.status, t.remain_course, t.create_time from tg_study_student t order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: select_study_course_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id, t.week_info, t.course_time, t.class_name, t.classroom_name, t.teacher_name, t.status, t.description, t.create_time from tg_study_course t order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: select_study_class_rel_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id, t.student_name, t.class_name, t.teacher_name, t.status, t.create_time from tg_study_student_class_rel t order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: select_study_course_rel_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id, t.course_week_info, t.course_time, t.student_name,t.class_name, t.classroom_name, t.teacher_name, t.status, t.create_time from tg_study_student_course_rel t order by t.create_time asc
